name: PowerBISetCredentials
description: Sets credentials for the datasources of a dataset, dataflow, or report.
author: bguidinger

inputs.name: Connection
inputs.label: Power BI connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: The service connection to Power BI.

inputs.name: Workspace
inputs.label: Workspace
inputs.helpMarkDown: The ID or name of the workspace. If not specified, your personal workspace will be used.

inputs.name: Name
inputs.label: Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The ID or name of the dataset, dataflow, or report.

inputs.name: ConnectionStrings
inputs.label: Connection Strings
inputs.helpMarkDown: Connection strings in JSON format. The keys are the names of the data sources.  The values are the connection strings.
